pullRequest.title: Respond with 404 when calling operation rest api with invalid operation guid
pullRequest.bodyText:
Catch NoResultException, which originates from JPA, when quering the
operations by ID. Throw NotFoundException, which is mapped to 404 status
code. Issue: LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-1864

nodes.bodyText: Add the NoResultException as a cause for the NotFoundException.
